LOCAL int eapi_start_test_case ( unsigned  module_id,
unsigned  case_id,
unsigned  groupid 
)

Start test case execution.

Parameters:
module_id test module identifierm
case_id test case identifier.
groupid test group id.
Returns:
0 on success, 1 on error.
Start executing test case identified by module_id and case_id. If groupid is greater than zero, check first if there is ongoing case with the same groupid.
